author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Get notified when we launch our next Kickstarter for our modular trench and building system for both sci-fi and historical / fantasy games:   https://www.miniwargaming.com/perdition

Check out the start of this incredible Trenches of Perdition set for Warhammer 40k, Trench Crusade, and many other games! We are planning on making a huge 40k terrain table for Horus Heresy Zone Mortalis. What kind of wargaming terrain and building terrain do you want to see?

#3dprintedterrain
title: A Massive Bunker Compound #trenchesofperdition
